creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: flat planes of color; squat lantern in foreground with cutouts; orange leaves on trees; white wall topped with grey roof tiles in background
inscription: in left margin, embossed: [?????　灯篭と紅葉] (1964nen saku, ?????)
markings: LRC in the print, in red: seal: [吉田] (Yoshida)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with embossing
signed: LLC in bottom margin, in pencil: [Lantern and Maples]; LRC in bottom margin, in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida]
title: Lantern and Maples
